trends: There have been no other sightings in Sperry
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailssighting report: our family lives in a rural setting in extreme southeast iowa. we live on top of a bluff about 10 miles west of the mississippi river. between the hours of 12:30 a.m. and 4:00 a.m. approximately 30 degrees from the earth s surface in the horizon there has been for the last 6-8 weeks and as of this date 4\13\05 what appears to be a star. significantly brighter than the other stars around it. this "star" moves and changes colors with a particular pattern of movement. it will hover for a few minutes then it will travel straight up and then move to the right and back to the left in a triangular pattern. at the same time patterns of light are changing from red to green appearing amber most of the time. when it changes direction and moves it turns bright green and then when it stops it dims and then becomes luminous back to amber and then green. on occasion there have been more than one. to see them in the sky and to measure is so difficult. the brightest one has been seen "flashing" and another "star" will be approximately "3 feet" to the right" when the brightest star flashes the other will be luminous in green and red and on occasion blue. it s as though they are communicating to each other in some way. the dimmer one will hover and then move the left and then to the right and go back to the top in it s own triangular pattern. the brightest one will "brighten up" and travel to the right and then left and back to the top. i d guess that over the last 14 days there has only been one night when it wasn t visible to us. i have wondered about national security practices in our air space. for example, we have hi-tech warplanes and they are practicing maneuvers or something. but like clockwork in a rural area say within a 75 mile radius evey night? we have obviously been trying to rule out the theory of a ufo. but, we are beginning to accept, understand and believe the theory and possibility of ufos. afterall, what are small town hicks with lots of country, farm fields and timeber with the mighty mississipi going to do about them?!! coincidentally, where the patriot missles are built is our large ammunition plant that built nuclear weapons in the 1970s is within 30 miles of where we live.
